thread.section_title: Hotel Panache - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location and high spec hotel
thread.title_full: Great location and high spec hotel - Review of Hotel Panache, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: PeddersUK
title: Great location and high spec hotel
text:
Situated close to Gare du Nord and near multiple metro stations, this is a perfect location if you want to walk around the city as we did. If you don't there are also lots of places to go for food and drink as the place is buzzing around the clock, without being too busy or noisy.
The hotel itself is very nicely appointed, with lots of quirky art-deco details and rooms very comfortable. Service is friendly and the restaurant serves a very nice continental breakfast in a lovely space with lots of light.
